Disclosure Requirement E5-5 - Resource outflows
AR 26. Products and materials information to be provided under paragraph 35 refers to all materials
and products that come out of the undertakingâ€™s production process and that a company puts on the
market (including packaging).
AR 27. When compiling the rate, the undertaking shall use as denominator the overall total weight of
materials used during the reporting period.
